content:
I'm currently building my own obfuscator using llvm passes and I was wondering if I could add annotations to functions like clang. LLVM-Obfuscator uses this (Source):

int foo() __attribute((__annotate__(("fla"))));
int foo() {
   return 2;
}

Haven't found anything on how to do this with Rust. Even if it's not possible, what would you consider the closest thing that could be used for that too? Thanks in advance.
